projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title: ME - Civil/Infrastructure, Project , Project 2  Title Mechanical (Master Degree) , 3  BIM/Revit/HAP/Dialux knowledge preferred Title: Finance (Master Degree)
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: ME - Civil/Infrastructure

Description: PPP/EPC Space in Project Engineering Consulting Business

Skill sets: 1

Expected learning: Opportunity to learn about advisory services on PPP / EPC / Due Diligence in sectors like Aviation / Highway. Possibility of interaction with various professionals related to construction field including Client, Architect, Contractor and Vendors.

Specific courses required for project execution: Good knowledge in CAD software. BIM/Revit knowledge preferred

Project 2

Title Mechanical (Master Degree)

Description: MEP in Buildings and Mechanical in Oil & Gas

Skill sets: 1

Expected learning: Opportunity to learn Basic Engineering, Review of Detailed Engineering in MEP/

HVAC, and Oil & Gas Sector Specific courses required for project execution: Good knowledge in CAD software.

Project 3

BIM/Revit/HAP/Dialux knowledge preferred Title: Finance (Master Degree)

Description: Techno-Economic Feasibility Studies

Skill sets: 1

Expected learning: Opportunity to learn about Financial & Economic Feasibility studies, Financial Modeling in PPP of aviation sector

Specific courses required for project execution: Good knowledge of Excel including Macros,

Graphical Presentation
